name: Losty Cheesy
description:
In Losty Cheesy, you play a mouse trying to find... A cheese...
Lost in a really dark dungeon, your only way out is finding the cheese as quickly as you can in the dark with the help of matches and dashes.
But beware of the cats and the traps !
This game is the first one made for a GGJ made with a team of 6.
We will attempt to update the game in a week in order to properly add sounds, a timer, UI, VFX and more game feedbacks that we did not have time to develop.

The controls are :

The arrows on the keyboard : Move the mouse.
E : Light a match.
Space : Dash
